channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Shortcodes Plugin — Shortcodes Ultimate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Shortcodes Plugin — Shortcodes Ultimate

item.title: CVE-2021-24525|2024-08-03T19:35:19.902Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20shortcodes%20plugin%20%E2%80%94%20shortcodes%20ultimate
item.description: The Shortcodes Ultimate WordPress plugin before 5.10.2 allows users with Contributor roles to perform stored XSS via shortcode attributes. Note: the plugin is inconsistent in its handling of shortcode attributes; some do escape, most don't, and there are even some attributes that are insecure by design (like [su_button]'s onclick attribute).
